titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to allow loans under the Thrift Savings Plan to be made for expenses associated with the adoption of a child.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 3/20/1996--Introduced. Amends Federal civil service law to allow loans from the Thrift Savings Plan of the Federal Employees' Retirement System for expenses associated with the adoption of a child.
